meanings.definition: The flat metal base of an iron.
meanings.sent1: The soleplate of the iron was hot to the touch.
meanings.sent2: She carefully glided the iron's soleplate over the wrinkled shirt.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat decided to nap on the warm soleplate of the iron.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the iron's soleplate.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming soleplate reflected the light, making ironing easier.

meanings.definition: The bottom part of a shoe that touches the ground.
meanings.sent1: The soleplate of his shoe had worn out from all the walking.
meanings.sent2: She felt the pebbles through the thin soleplate of her shoe.
meanings.sent3: The muddy soleplate left imprints on the clean floor.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was as solid as the soleplate of his shoe.
meanings.sent5: The worn soleplate told the story of many journeys taken.
